des: Kidz Fractions has questions and provides hints for solving addition problems. The questions are categorized in to easy, medium and hard. Users can select a category from easy, medium and hard to solve fractions based on the selected category. User can skip to skip the question, say hint or repeat . One requirement of this skill is that the answers for the questions need to be in the fraction format - number by number. Even if the answer is 2 or 1, the user has to say 2 by 1 or 1 by 1.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
